install.name: AcyMailing Manage text
install.author: Acyba
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009-2018 ACYBA SAS - All rights reserved..
install.description: This plugin enables you to remove some text from your Newsletter or add a signature at the end of all your Newsletters or add/remove an e-mail from the queue...

param.name: help
param.label: Help
param.description: Click on the help button to get some help

param.name: removetext
param.label: Text to remove
param.description: Enter the different strings you want AcyMailing to remove and separate them with a comma. Example : {reg},{/reg},{pub},{/pub}

param.name: removetags
param.label: Code to remove
param.description: AcyMailing will remove all tags specified in this option and its content, separate them with a comma

param.name: footer
param.label: Footer
param.description: Write the text you want to be added at the end of each e-mail

param.name: frontendaccess
param.label: Front-end Access for filter
param.description: You can restrict the access to the filter 'Randomly select X Users' on the Front-end
param.option: Don't display this filter on the front-end
